title: Part. Mot. Cubic Position Function part - b

content.description: Particle X moves along the positive x-axis so that its position at time t≥0 is given by x(t)=5t3−9t2+7
content.question: At what time t ≥ 0 is particle X farthest to the left? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: At what time t ≥ 0 is particle X farthest to the left? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
